revised_title: Discovery and Properties of a New Detonating Compound
tldr: Humphry Davy discovered a new detonating compound made of nitrogen and chlorine. The substance was explosive and could react violently with various substances, including phosphorus, mercury, and alcohol. Davy proposed that the compound could be a combination of nitrogen and chlorine similar to the one mentioned in a letter from Paris. The discovery led to further experiments and understanding of the properties and potential dangers of the new substance.
